required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Somofilcon A 1-Day Multifocal Study - Real World Subjective Acceptance Study
clinical_study.official_title: Clariti 1-Day Multifocal Study - 'Real World' Subjective Acceptance Study (HARP)

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the study is to evaluate the performance of somofilcon A 1 day multifocal when worn on a daily disposable wear modality over a period of up to 3 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Vision Clarity During the Day - Distance Vision
primary_outcome.description: Subjective expectation -Vision clarity during the day - distance vision was measured from three subjective expectation responses completed at the office. The responses were assigned numbers as below: Fell short of expectations = 1 Met my expectations = 2 Exceeded my expectations = 3

primary_outcome.measure: Vision Clarity During the Day - Distance Vision
primary_outcome.description: Subjective expectation - Vision clarity during the day - distance vision was measured from three subjective expectation responses completed at the office. The responses were assigned numbers as below: Fell short of expectations = 1 Met my expectations = 2 Exceeded my expectations = 3

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Lens Centration
secondary_outcome.description: Lens centration on the cornea (Optimum, Acceptable decentration, Unacceptable decentration (>=0.5mm))

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Lens Centration
secondary_outcome.description: Lens centration on the cornea (Optimum, Acceptable decentration, Unacceptable decentration (>=0.5mm))
Distance visual acuity (logMAR)
Distance visual acuity (logMAR)

Movement of lens on eye after blink was graded on a 5-point Likert scale (0-4, 1 steps) as follows: 0 - insufficient, 1 - minimal but acceptable, 2 - optimal, 3 - moderate but acceptable, and 4 - excessive unacceptable movement.

Movement of lens on eye after blink was graded on a 5-point scale (0-4, 1 steps) as follows: 0 - insufficient, 1 - minimal but acceptable, 2 - optimal, 3 - moderate but acceptable , and 4 - excessive unacceptable.

Corneal staining will be assessed for extent (0-100) with 0 indicating no staining/indentation and 100 indicating deep confluent staining or severe indentation for following regions: Temporal, Superior, Nasal, Inferior and Central.

Corneal staining will be assessed for extent (0-100) with 0 indicating no staining/indentation and 100 indicating deep confluent staining or severe indentation for following regions: Temporal, Superior, Nasal, Inferior and Central.

Conjunctival staining will be assessed using CORE integer scale (0-100) with 0 indicating no staining/indentation and 100 indicating deep confluent staining or severe indentation for following regions: Temporal, Superior, Nasal, Inferior.

Conjunctival staining will be assessed using CORE integer scale (0-100) with 0 indicating no staining/indentation and 100 indicating deep confluent staining or severe indentationfor following regions: Temporal, Superior, Nasal, Inferior.
Grading hyperemia of bulbar conjunctiva on a scale ranged from 0-4 and in 0.50 steps, with 0 indicating no hyperemia and 4 indicating severe hyperemia.
Grading hyperemia of bulbar conjunctiva on a scale ranged from 0-4 and in 0.50 steps, with 0 indicating no hyperemia and 4 indicating severe hyperemia.

secondary_outcome.measure: Subjective Vision Satisfaction - Driving at Night
secondary_outcome.description: Subjective satisfaction of distance vision while driving at night responses for habitual lens (1= fell short of expectation, 2 = met expectation, 3= exceed expectation)

secondary_outcome.measure: Subjective Vision Satisfaction - Driving at Night
secondary_outcome.description: Subjective satisfaction of distance vision while driving at night responses for somofilcon A multifocal lens (1= fell short of expectation, 2 = met expectation, 3= exceed expectation)

secondary_outcome.measure: Subjective Vision Satisfaction - Long Intermediate Vision
secondary_outcome.description: Subjective satisfaction of long intermediate vision while using desktop computer for habitual lens (1= fell short of expectation, 2= met expectation, 3= exceed expectation)

secondary_outcome.measure: Subjective Vision Satisfaction - Long Intermediate Vision
secondary_outcome.description: Subjective satisfaction of long intermediate vision while using desktop computer for somofilcon A multifocal lens (1= fell short of expectation, 2= met expectation, 3= exceed expectation)

secondary_outcome.measure: Subjective Vision Satisfaction - Short Intermediate Tasks
secondary_outcome.description: Subjective satisfaction of short/intermediate vision while using laptop/tablet for habitual lens (1= fell short of expectation, 2= met expectation, 3= exceed expectation)

secondary_outcome.measure: Subjective Vision Satisfaction - Short Intermediate Tasks
secondary_outcome.description: Subjective satisfaction of short/intermediate vision while using laptop/tablet for somofilcon A multifocal lens (1= fell short of expectation, 2= met expectation, 3= exceed expectation)
Subjective satisfaction of near vision while reading on cell phone and hand-held materials for habitual lens (1 = fell short of expectation, 2 = met expectation, 3 = exceed expectation)

Subjective satisfaction of near vision while reading on cell phone and hand-held materials for somofilcon A multifocal lens (1 = fell short of expectation, 2 = met expectation, 3 = exceed expectation)
Subjective rating how easy lens was inserted on eye for habitual lens (1 = Fell short of expectation, 2 = Met expectation, 3 = Exceeded expectations)
Subjective rating how easy lens was inserted on eye for somofilcon A multifocal lens (1 = Fell short of expectation, 2 = Met expectation, 3 = Exceeded expectations)
Subjective rating for habitual lens on how easy lens was removed from eye (1 = Fell short of expectation, 2 = Met expectation, 3 = Exceeded expectations)
Subjective rating for somofilcon A multifocal lens on how easy lens was removed from eye (1 = Fell short of expectation, 2 = Met expectation, 3 = Exceeded expectations)

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall Satisfaction With Speed of Changing Focus
secondary_outcome.description: Subjective rating for speed and ability to change focus between distances for habitual lens (1 = Fell short of expectation, 2 = Met expectation, 3 = Exceeded expectations)

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall Satisfaction With Speed of Changing Focus
secondary_outcome.description: Subjective rating for speed and ability to change focus between distances for somofilcon A multifocal lens (1 = Fell short of expectation, 2 = Met expectation, 3 = Exceeded expectations)

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall Satisfaction Preference Between Study and Habitual Contact Lenses
secondary_outcome.description: Subjective satisfaction preference of contact lens between study and habitual contact lenses(Fell short of expectations, Met my expectation, Exceeded my expectation)

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall Satisfaction Preference Between Study and Habitual Contact Lenses
secondary_outcome.description: Subjective satisfaction preference between study and habitual contact lenses (Fell short of expectations, Met ,my expectations, Exceeded my expectations))

Subjective rating of comfort for habitual lens and somofilcon A multifocal lens at 3 weeks (Prefer my own strongly, Prefer my own slightly, No preference, Prefer study lenses slightly, Prefer study lenses strongly)

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall Preference Between Study and Habitual Contact Lenses for Lifestyle
secondary_outcome.description: Preference of contact lens for the whole range of tasks (Prefer strongly, Prefer slightly, No preference, Prefer study lenses slightly, Prefer study lenses strongly)

arm_group.description: Habitual wearers of multifocal contact lenses will be refit to somofilcon A multifocal lens and provide a subjective assessment.

facility.name: Center for Contact Lens Research, University of Waterloo

provided_document.document_type: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

group.title: Somofilcon A Multifocal Lens
group.description: Habitual wearers of multifocal contact lenses will be refit to somofilcon A multifocal lens and provide a subjective assessment. somofilcon A multifocal lens: contact lens

baseline.population: Fifty-one participants were enrolled in the study. Habitual wearers of multifocal soft contact lenses were refit with clariti 1day multifocal. 48 participants completed the study.

group.description: Total Participants

measure.title: Race and Ethnicity Not Collected
measure.population: Race and Ethnicity were not collected from any participant.

group.description: Habitual wearers of multifocal contact lenses will be refit to somofilcon A multifocal lens and provide a subjective assessment at the final visit for overall preference. Contact lens - Habitual Lens and somofilcon A contact lens

measure.title: Overall Preference Between Study and Habitual Contact Lenses for Lifestyle
measure.description: Preference of contact lens for the whole range of tasks (Prefer strongly, Prefer slightly, No preference, Prefer study lenses slightly, Prefer study lenses strongly)

reported_events.time_frame: From baseline visit of habitual lens through follow up visit of somofilcon A multifocal lens for an average of 3 weeks

group.title: Somofilcon A Multifocal Lens
group.description: Habitual wearers of multifocal contact lenses will be refit to somofilcon A multifocal lens and provide a subjective assessment. somofilcon A multifocal lens: contact lens

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
